champ.champInfo:
Venue of the competition: Salaspils sporta nams, Smilšu iela 1, Latvia, LV-2121 (Salaspils Sports House, st. Smilshu, 1)

The competition is held on March 16, 2024, Salaspils, Latvia

IMPORTANT NOTICE!!! Please note that entrance to the sports hall is allowed ONLY with INDOOR SHOES or puting SHOE COVERS!!!


Tournament regulations:

March 15, 2024:

Credentials Committee - 17:00 - 22:00

Credentials committee for teams LKKL, KARATE SKOLA: Salaspils sporta nams, Smilšu iela 1, Latvia, LV-2121 (Salaspils house sports, st. Smilshu, 1) (all participants must present ID or passport)
Credentials committee for all other teams: Brīvības 199c, Riga, Latvija, LV-1039, Rija VEF Hotel ***. (all participants must present ID or passport)

March 16, 2024:

  • 07:30 – 08:30 - Additional weigh-in ONLY for teams of Lithuania, Latvia and Estonia. Latvia - only for teams from cities located further than 80 km from Riga. All participants must present an ID or passport.
  • 08:30 – 09:30 – judge seminar
  • 10:00 – 10:40 – opening ceremony
  • 11:00 – 19:00 – kumite (fights)
  • 14:00 – 14:40 – presentation of awards. Fights in other categories do not stop during the awards ceremony

All tournament participants are divided into categories: Series B (fighters with qualifications up to 9 kyu) and Series A (fighters with qualifications from 8 kyu and above).

  • In the first half of the tournament (10:00 - 14:00) all categories of Series В perform on all tatamis
  • As the series В fights end, the series А category fights will start on the tatami without any interruption
  • At the end of the series В matches, the finalists of series В will be awarded. The series А category matches will continue

Tournament entry requirements:

  • When forming categories, specialized software is used AllianceKumite
  • Categories are formed separately for participants in series A and series B
  • The division of participants into series is carried out exclusively according to competitions
  • If a participant with a qualification below 8 kyu will take part in a series B tournament, then he must be submitted in the application as a participant with 8 kyu
  • The weight of the participant indicated in the application MUST NOT exceed the upper limit of the weight category in which you are applying. Those. if a participant is declared with a weight of 25.1 kg, then this is already a category of 25-30 kg.
  • It is important to indicate the correct date of birth. The program itself calculates the number of full years of the participant as of March 16, 2024


    • Be careful when submitting applications!

Judging of the competition is carried out in accordance with the standards and rules of Kyokushinkai karate (5 judges, flag signaling).

Competitions in all groups and categories are held according to the rules Kyokushinkai karate – knee strike to the head, mae geri, kakato geri and mawashi kaiten Geri to the head are permitted techniques.

JUDGES

Each team is required to bring 1 judge with them. If the team does not bring its judge, the organizer may demand compensation in the amount of 30 euros!!!
Uniform for judges – white or blue shirt with short sleeves, tie or bow tie (black), black trousers or jeans, your own whistle

WINNER'S REWARD CEREMONY

  • Personal competition: 1-3 places are awarded cups and diplomas of the corresponding degrees
  • Team competition: 1-3 places are awarded cups and diplomas of the corresponding degrees
  • Nominations Series A:
    • Best technique Girls/Boys – cup and diploma
    • The shortest match Girls / Boys - cup and diploma
    • For the will to win Girls / Boys - cup and diploma
  • Nominations Series B:
    • Best fighter Girls/Boys – cup and diploma

Registration on the website: https://alliance-kumite.net/login
E-mail address for registration issues: tatarchenkoiu@ukr.net
The application deadline is 03/03/2024 inclusive

Contacts of the tournament organizers: latvian.national.team@gmail.com or by phone: +37129390066 Tatyana (LV, RU, EN)

Tournament participation fee EUR 40.00

ACCOMMODATION OF PARTICIPANTS

For convenience, the organizer has agreed on special prices for online posting hotels in Riga. To make a reservation at these hotels, write to the following email address: (hidden)
